projects.title: Simple e-commerce website
projects.description:
Developed a full-stack e-commerce application using java and Spring boot, implementing RESTful APIs for product management. Designed and integrated CRUD operations for products and utitlized h2 with hibernate for persistence.
Developed a custom search feature using JPA and SQL, allowing users to retrieve products dynamically based on multiple fields. Implemented spring security to verify user login

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: An interactive personal portfolio built using React, showcasing my skills, projects, and professional experience. The website is deployed on Vercel for fast and reliable hosting. It uses resuable React components,utilizing hooks and managing state. It uses tailwind CSS for styling UI. The website displays data such as skills and projects using JSON format, which is processed and rendered in components.
